trans-unit.source: Retrieves the incremental search string of the control

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the incremental search string of the control

target.mrk: Retrieves the incremental search string of the control

trans-unit.source: Returns an Incremental search string or an empty string if no search string exists.

seg-source.mrk: Returns an Incremental search string or an empty string if no search string exists.

target.mrk: Returns an Incremental search string or an empty string if no search string exists.

trans-unit.source: The incremental search string is the character sequence that the user types while the list view has the input focus.

seg-source.mrk: The incremental search string is the character sequence that the user types while the list view has the input focus.

target.mrk: The incremental search string is the character sequence that the user types while the list view has the input focus.

trans-unit.source: Each time the user types a character, the system appends the character to the search string and then searches for a matching item.

seg-source.mrk: Each time the user types a character, the system appends the character to the search string and then searches for a matching item.

target.mrk: Each time the user types a character, the system appends the character to the search string and then searches for a matching item.

trans-unit.source: If the system finds a match, it selects the item and, if necessary, scrolls it into view.

seg-source.mrk: If the system finds a match, it selects the item and, if necessary, scrolls it into view.

target.mrk: If the system finds a match, it selects the item and, if necessary, scrolls it into view.

trans-unit.source: A time-out period is associated with each character that the user types.

seg-source.mrk: A time-out period is associated with each character that the user types.

target.mrk: A time-out period is associated with each character that the user types.

trans-unit.source: If the time-out period elapses before the user types another character, the incremental search string is reset.

seg-source.mrk: If the time-out period elapses before the user types another character, the incremental search string is reset.

target.mrk: If the time-out period elapses before the user types another character, the incremental search string is reset.
